title: Is this EUW?
body:
The OCE servers are lagging horribly, is anyone else experiencing this Issue and are RIOT doing anything to fix this?

Both teams in my current game are constantly being disconnected and there are windows of 3-5 minutes where we can actually play before going back to "Attempting to Reconnect".

Both teams are complaining about this issue, as it has never happened to me before I was just wondering what exactly is going on?

Update: I finally had enough of waiting for it to connect again, left the game and went straight to the end game screen.

replies.body:
>Is this EUW?

kek

OCE servers aren't known for their quality, exactly. Although nowhere near as large an area as EUW, OCE has to cover quite a bit of ground (from Indonesia to New Zealand, as well as all the islands floating about that have underwater/wireless lines).

Where are you playing from?

P.S. Bumps don't work here.
I was playing from Cairns, Queensland, Although it was everyone in the game that was having the problem not just me, and I doubt that everyone in the game was playing from the same location.

Exactly the point; if the people that are playing are all from extremely distant places relative to one another, then the likelihood of disconnection increases.

You're in a pretty good spot, though, because Queensland is roughly in the middle of it all.
